name: ...And the Men that Come to See Me
effect:
Can only be played when the card titled For the Women that Want to Be Me... is in your Ring area.
Reverse any card and end your opponent's turn. If your opponent is a Male Superstar, he discards # cards, where # is equal to your Superstar Value.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: ...Change Reality
effect:
Can only be played when the cards titled Wake Up... and ...Look Around... are in your Ring area.
As an action, shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and draw up to 3 cards. Then, search your opponent's Arsenal for up to 3 cards, put them into his Ringside pile, and he shuffles his Arsenal.
As a reversal, reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Raw logo
Unique

name: ...Look Around...
effect:
Can only be played when the card titled Wake Up... is in your Ring area.
As an action, look at your opponent's Backlash deck and choose 1 Action card. Your opponent discards the card chosen.
As a reversal, reverse any Action card played from your opponent's hand and end his turn.
Search your Arsenal and Ringside pile for the card titled ...Change Reality, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
Raw logo
Unique

name: <WWE logo> Centerfold of the Year
effect:
When your opponent is a Male Superstar, he plays with his hand revealed.
When he is a Female Superstar, once during each of your turns, before your Draw Segment, he overturns 1 card.
Smackdown logo
Permanent
Unique

name: A Beating You'll Never Forget
effect:
This card is -10F when played by Triple H.
When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then put 1 Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand.
When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may discard 3 cards and then put this card into your Backlash deck.
Raw logo
Unique

name: All the Things She Said...
effect:
Shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, draw 1 card, put 1 card from your Ringside pile into your hand, remove 1 card in your opponent's Ringside pile from the game, and your opponent discards 1 card.
Raw logo
Unique
"... and all that!" - Stevie Richards

name: APA or A-Train?
effect:
Can only be revealed if your Superstar card says you can reveal an Enforcer card.
• Starting Hand Size: +12
Superstar Value: +3
Superstar Ability: + Your maneuvers played from your hand are +1D. You cannot play non-unique Action cards from your hand.
• Starting Hand Size: +6
Superstar Value: +1
Superstar Ability: + Once during each of your turns, you may discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique card with the word "power," "bomb," or "slam" in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it in your hand and shuffle your Arsenal. Your cards with the word "power," "bomb" or "slam" in the title are -4F.

name: Arm Breaker
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent must discard 1 card in order to play an Action card.
Active
"Word to your hand, drop one to play an A." - John Cena

name: Asset Retrieval
effect: When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then search your Arsenal for 1 card that has the words "packed by a Female Superstar" or "packed by a Diva Superstar" in the text, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

name: Atomic Lariat
effect:
Can only be reversed by hybrid Reversal cards or unique Reversal cards.
"And another lariat! When will this stop?" - Jim Ross

name: Ax Kick
effect:
As a reversal, reverse any card that would allow your opponent to search his Arsenal for any number of cards and end his turn.
"He's gonna be lookin' for somethin' else now! Ha, ha!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Back to Basics
effect:
You can only play Pre-match cards with the words "old school" in the title.
Your opponent cannot play the card titled Hell in a Cell Match.
Search your Arsenal for 1 of each of the cards titled Arm Bar, Arm Bar Takedown, Arm Drag, Atomic Drop, Belly to Back Suplex, Belly to Belly Suplex, Body Slam, Chop, Clothesline, Collar & Elbow Lockup, Drop Kick, Haymaker, Head Butt, Hip Toss, Press Slam, Punch, Roundhouse Punch, Russian Leg Sweep, Snap Mare, Vertical Suplex, Wrist Lock, Backhand Slap, Drop Toe Hold, Elbow Drop, Foot Stomp, and Hammerlock, reveal them to your opponent, and put them under this card. You may play these cards as if they were in your hand. Your opponent searches your Arsenal and Backlash deck. If he finds any non-Superstar-specific Maneuver cards, you lose the game via Pinfall Victory. Shuffle your Arsenal.
Permanent

name: Backstage Interview with Terri
effect:
Can only be played when the card titled Trash Talkin' Interview is in your Ring area.
When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may draw up to 2 cards, then put any number of cards titled Trash Tralkin' Interview and any number of cards with that card in the text from your Ringside pile into your Ring area, and then put this card into your Ringside pile.
Raw logo
Unique

name: Beatings from Dudleyville
effect:
Cannot be reversed from your opponent's hand when this is your first non-Pre-match card played of the game.
When this card is in your Ringside pile, if your Superstar is Buh Buh Ray Dudley, during your turn you may discard 1 card and then put this card into your hand.
When successfully played, discard 1 card.
Raw logo
Unique
"We're the welcoming committee." - D-Von Dudley

name: Believe the Hype
effect:
Draw 1 card, shuffle up to 7 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, and your opponent discards 3 cards.
Raw logo
Unique
"It's probably the most impressive streak in this business." - Jim Ross

name: Benoit's German Suplex
effect:
This card is -6F when played by Chris Benoit.
Can only be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck and Arsenal when the card titled Series of Suplexes is in your Ring area.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 1
"It's great to see Benoit back in action!" - Michael Cole

name: Boot Lace
effect:
Cannot be reversed from your opponent's hand.
As a maneuver, can only be played if you reversed a card from your hand or Arsenal to end your opponent's last turn and this is the first card played of your turn.
As an action, discard this card and draw 1 card. Doing this will cause no damage to your opponent.

name: Brock Block
effect:
Can only be reversed from your opponent's hand.
When successfully played, you may search your Arsenal for the card titled Series of Back Breakers, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 1

name: Chest Lock Drop
effect:
When played by a Diva Superstar, your opponent may discard 3 cards. If he does not, he cannot modify the Fortitude of his cards for the rest of the turn.
"Did you feel that excitement surge through you?" - Jerry "The King" Lawler "No comment, King." - Jim Ross

name: Chick Kick
effect:
Unless your Superstar is Trish Stratus, can only be packed by a Diva Superstar.
When successfully played, if your opponent is a Male Superstar, he overturns 4 cards.
When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and your next Maneuver card played this turn is -6F.
When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may discard 1 card, put this card into your hand, end your turn.

name: Chop Block
effect:
As a maneuver, this card is +2D for every Heel card in your Ring area and can only be played after the card titled Irish Whip or Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle.
As a reversal, reverse the cards titled Irish Whip, Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle, or Over the Top Rope, or any maneuver played after those cards, and end your opponent's turn.

name: Dare to Take a Challenge
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, you may discard 1 card and then your opponent discards 2 cards. Then he may discard 1 card and you discard 2 cards. Repeat this until you or your opponent stops.
Active

name: Distractingly Divalicious
effect:
Can only be packed by a Male Superstar.
Can only be played when your opponent is a Male Superstar.
When this card is in your Ring area, non-Reversal cards cannot be played during the first two turns of the match.

name: Divas Overload!
effect:
Can only be packed by a Diva Superstar.
Can be packed by every Diva Superstar, regardless of their Superstar Ability.
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver and if you have 3 or more cards in your Ring area with the words "packed by a Female Superstar" or "packed by a Diva Superstar" in the text.
Stun Value: 1

name: Diving Bulldog
effect:
Can only be played if you reversed a card to end your opponent's last turn and this is the first card played of your turn.
Smackdown logo
Stun Value: 1
"What a quick turn of events! That wasn't expected." - Michael Cole

name: Do You Want a Hug?
effect:
The card titled Hell in the Cell Match is blanked for the rest of the turn.
If your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating and you have fewer cards in your hand than your opponent, your opponent discards # cards, where # is equal to the number of cards he has in his hand greater than you. When played by The Rattlesnake, you may then draw up to 2 cards.
If your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, your opponent discards his hand. Choose # cards from your opponent's Ringside pile and put them into his hand, where # is equal to the number of cards discarded. When played by The Rattlesnake, your opponent then discards 2 cards.
Raw logo
Unique

name: Does This Look Good on Me?
effect:
As an action, look at your opponent's hand, choose up to 2 cards, and your opponent discards the chosen cards.
As a reversal, when overturned, reverse any Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Smackdown logo
Unique
"I meant the outfit, what were you thinking?" - Torrie Wilson

name: Don't Be Shy
effect:
Cannot be reversed when played by a Diva Superstar.
Look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 Maneuver card with Fortitude equal to or less than his Fortitude Rating. During his next turn, the chosen card must be his first card played or he ends his turn.

name: Don't Cross the Boss
effect:
When this card is in your Ringside pile, your cards titled No Chance in Hell! are -6F and put this card into your hand when you play the card titled No Chance in Hell!
When this card is in your Ring area, your cards titled No Chance in Hell! are -6F and when your opponent successfully plays an Action card, you may draw 1 card. When the card titled Managed by Vince McMahon is in your Ring area, the maximum number of Mid-match cards your opponent may have in his Ring area is reduced by 2.
Active

name: Double Clothesline Takedown
effect: As a reversal, when overturned, reverse the card titled Double Clothesline Takedown and end your opponent's turn, or when played from your hand, can only be played after the successfully played card titled Double Clothesline Takedown. That card does its normal damage, regardless of overturned Reversal cards. End your opponent's turn.

name: Drinking Beer - Raising Hell - Kicking A%$
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, if your Fortitude Rating is 5 or greater, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile, shuffle up to # cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, your opponent discards # cards, and your maneuvers are +#D for the rest of the turn, where # is equal to your Superstar Value.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: Drop Dead Gorgeous
effect:
Cannot be reversed when your opponent is a Male Superstar.
All players discard their hands.
Smackdown logo
Unique
"Oh, my! Things just got interesting!" - Michael Cole

name: Edge or Big Show?
effect:
Can only be revealed if your Superstar card says you can reveal an Enforcer card.
When this card is revealed, you cannot play cards that would increase your opponent's Superstar Value.
• Starting Hand Size: +#
Superstar Value: +3
Superstar Ability: +# is equal to twice your opponent's Superstar Value. You start the game after the Pre-match phase.
• Starting Hand Size: +9
Superstar Value: +3
Superstar Ability: +You must discard 2 cards in order to play a maneuver, unless it is your first maneuver played of the turn. You cannot play High Risk maneuvers. Your opponent's Grapple maneuvers played do no more than a maximum of 3D.

name: Elbow Smash
effect:
When successfully played, put 1 Set-up card and 1 card with the world "elbow" in the title from your Ringside pile into your hand.
Stun Value: 1
"It's finally all coming together. Almost." - Tazz

name: F-U
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played card.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 3
"I'll knock you down, just like a truck, but don't cry to me, 'cause I don't give a..." - John Cena

name: Falls Count Anywhere Match
effect:
Any player wins via Pinfall victory if his Fortitude Rating is greater than his opponent's Fortitude Rating; and if he has 4 cards in his Ring area titled Throw Opponent Out of the Ring, Over the Barricade, Into the Barricade, Over the Top Rope, Tossed Between the Ropes, or Top Rope Toss; and if his opponent has no cards in his hand.
Active
Permanent

name: For the Women that Want to Be Me...
effect:
When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may overturn 3 cards and then put this card into your Ring area and you may choose 1 different Enforcer.
When this card is in your Ring area, and your opponent is a Diva Superstar, you may put this card into your Ringside pile to reverse any non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: Forearm Uppercut
effect:
When successfully played, overturn 1 card, you may draw 1 card, and your opponent discards 1 card.
Stun Value: 1
"People sometimes forget he's as crazy as a pet raccoon." - Jim Ross

name: Front Chancery
effect:
When successfully played, your opponent may shuffle 1 card from his Ringside pile into his Arsenal.
"This match is as exciting as watching paint dry, folks." - Tazz

name: Gail Kim & Molly Holly
effect:
Diva Superstar Ability:
At the end of Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for the card titled Wake Up... or Molly-Go-Round, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. During each of your turns, before your Draw Segment, choose Strike or Grapple. Your High Risk maneuvers and maneuvers of the chosen type are -3F until you choose otherwise.

name: Gail's Hurricanrana
effect:
As a reversal, reverse any Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2
"She has her whole world under control now..." - The Coach

name: Get a Look at These
effect:
Can only be packed by a Diva Superstar.
Can only be played when your opponent is a Male Superstar.
Your opponent may discard the card titled Escape Move. If he does not, discard up to 2 cards and then he overturns # cards, where # is equal to the total Damage value of the discarded cards. End your turn.

name: Get the Tables!
effect:
Can only be packed by a Male Superstar.
Cannot be reversed when played by The Dudley Boyz, Buh Buh Ray Dudley, or D-Von Dudley.
Search your Arsenal for up to 3 cards titled Table! Table! Table!, reveal them to your opponent, put 1 into your hand, put the rest into your Ringside pile, and shuffle your Arsenal.
When this card is in your Ring area, the maximum number of Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1.
Raw logo

name: GGGGGGoooooolllllldddddd-berg!
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, discard any number of cards. Put 1 card from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile for every 2 cards discarded.
Raw logo
Unique

name: Girl on Girl Action!
effect:
Can only be packed by a Female superstar.
As an action, put 1 non-unique Action card from your Ringside pile into your hand.
As a reversal, if your opponent is a GM or Female Superstar, reverse any non-unique Action card and end your opponent's turn.
Smackdown logo

name: Girly Punch
effect:
Can only be packed by a Female Superstar.
Can only be reversed by reversals of printed D: 0. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Over Sell Maneuver immediately after you play this card.
"Catfight!" - Jerry "The King" Lawler

name: Goldberg
effect:
Superstar Ability:
You cannot pack non-hybrid Reversal cards. You may discard 3 cards to reverse any non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Once during each of your turns, you may discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique card with the word "spear" or "jackhammer" in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Your cards titled Spear and Jackhammer are F:0 and +3D.

name: Goldberg's Jackhammer
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver with the word "spear" in the title or if you reversed a card to end your opponent's last turn and this is the first card played of your turn.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 4
"You won't be collecting any bounty." - Goldberg

name: Goldberg's Spear
effect:
As a reversal, reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2
"Spear! Spear! Spear!" - The Coach

name: Gory Special
effect:
As a maneuver, you may search your Arsenal for the card titled Eddie's Roll Up, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. If it is your next card played this turn, it cannot be reversed by the card titled Backlash!
As a reversal, reverse any Strike maneuver of 7D or greater and end your opponent's turn.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2

name: Gregory Helms, Ace Reporter
effect:
Your Starting Hand Size is +#, where # is equal to your Superstar Value.
Raw logo
Unique

name: Gut Buster On Top Rope
effect:
Cannot be reversed when the card titled Gut Buster is in your Ring area.
When played after the card titled Gut Wrench, your opponent's Reversal cards to this card are an additional +10F.
Stun Value: 1
"Give it to that maggot!" - Sergeant Slaughter

name: Highlight Reel
effect:
This card can be played during any of your Pre-match phases.
Your opponent may overturn 15 cards. If he does not, the maximum number of Pre-match cards he may have in his Ring area is reduced by 2.
Raw logo
Unique

name: Houston Hangover
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played 4D or greater maneuver.
When successfully played, search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 1
"The crowd's calling for The Bookend." - Jim Ross

name: Hurricane Clothesline
effect:
This card is -4F when played by The Hurricane.
Reversals to this card are +3D.
As a reversal, reverse any maneuver with the word "clothesline" in the title and end your opponent's turn.
Stun Value: 1
"Did somebody open a door?" - The Coach

name: I Know How to Use Them
effect:
You may choose 1 different Enforcer.
When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then put 1 card from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile.
Raw logo
Unique

name: I'll Take a Shot
effect:
Draw 1 card and reveal it. If it is an Action or Maneuver card and it is not your next card played this turn, discard it and end your turn. If it is your next card played this turn, if your opponent reverses it, he skips his next turn.
"Ha, sure take a chance." - Paul Heyman

name: I'm Always on Top...
effect: When this card is in your Ring area, your Maneuver cards are -3F. At the end of your turn, when your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, put this card into your Ringside pile.

name: I'm Gonna Break You
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, if your opponent has more cards in his Ring area than you have in your Ring area, look at his hand and choose # cards, where # is equal to the number of Pre-match cards he has in his Ring area and Ringside pile greater than you have in your Ring area and Ringside pile, and choose one: he discards the chosen cards or shuffles them into his Arsenal.
When this card is in your Ring area, when you have to remove any number of cards from the game, you may remove this card from the game instead of 1 of the cards.
Active

name: I'm Gonna Teach You a Lesson in Thuganomics
effect:
Reverse any Strike, Grapple, or Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Your opponent discards # cards, where # is equal to the number of cards he has in his hand greater than you have in your hand.
Smackdown logo
Unique
"This gimmick seems strangely familiar." - Tazz

name: I'm Just a Sexy Boy
effect:
As an action, can only be played as the first card of your turn and cannot be reversed when your opponent is a Female Superstar. Draw up to 6 cards.
As a reversal, reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn. Your opponent discards 4 cards.
Raw logo
Unique
"Oh, let me say, he's no boy." - Terri

name: I'm Trying Not to Lose My Temper
effect:
Can only be played when your opponent has more Pre-match cards in his Ring area than you have in your Ring area.
Cannot be reversed when your opponent is Los Guerreros.
Choose 1 Manager or Event card in your opponent's Ring area. When this card is in your Ring area, that card is blanked.
When your opponent is Ric Flair, this card is Permanent.

name: I've Got a Leg Up On You
effect:
Cannot be reversed when played by a Diva Superstar.
When this card is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns, if your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, you may overturn 1 card and then he overturns 2 cards.

name: I've Got a Nice ... Bottom
effect:
Can only be packed by a Diva Superstar.
When this card is in your Ring area, cards are overturned onto this card instead of put into your Ringside pile. During your turn, you may remove this card from the game and put up to 10 cards on top of this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and put the rest into your Ringside pile.
If this card is removed from your Ring area, put all cards on top of this card into your Ringside pile.
Active

name: I've Had More Championships than You've Had Women
effect:
Cannot be packed by a GM Superstar.
When this card is in your Ring area, your Title Belt cards have the added text of "The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1."
Active

name: If You're Not Cheating, You're Not Trying
effect:
Cannot be reversed when played by Los Guerreros.
Remove 1 card in your Ringside pile from the game and then either put 1 of your cards that has been removed from the game into your Ringside pile or put 1 card from your Ringside pile into your hand.
"Broken, whatchu talkin' bout?"- Eddie Guerrero

name: It Doesn't Stop
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver.
Discard 1 card. If your next card played this turn is a maneuver of 8D or less, you may ignore the "Can only be played after..." text and it cannot be reversed.
Smackdown logo

name: It's Over
effect:
Your next card played this turn cannot be reversed.
Active
"Folks, this match clearly appears to be over." - Michael Cole
"Very observant of you Cole, you're a genius!" - Tazz

name: It's Time I Made Some Changes
effect:
Shuffle any number of cards from your hand into your Arsenal and then draw the same number of cards.
"There are too many ways for this to go..." - Michael Cole

name: Jab
effect:
When successfully played, your opponent randomly discards 1 card from his Backlash deck.
"D-Von connects with another shot right to the jaw. That'll definitely pay dividends!" - Jim Ross

name: Jamie Noble Interferes
effect:
Reverse any non-Trademark-Finisher maneuver and end your opponent's turn. You may put 1 Action card from your Ringside pile into your hand.
Smackdown logo
Unique
"Where did he come from?"... "West Virginia." ... "Forget it." - Tazz & Michael Cole

name: John Cena
effect:
Superstar Ability:
When you successfully play a maneuver from your hand, you may discard 1 card and then your opponent randomly discards 3 cards from his Backlash deck. Your cards titled Taunt the Fans are not Heel cards. Ignore the "Can only be played..." text on your cards with the word "chain" in the title.

name: Lady's Grapevine
effect:
Can only be packed by a Diva superstar.
Cannot be reversed by the card titled Backlash!
As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played Submission maneuver.
As a reversal, reverse the cards titled Backslide, Roll Up, Inside Cradle, or Victory Roll and end your opponent's turn.
When successfully played, you and your opponent cannot play any cards that do not reverse this maneuver until it is reversed. Once during each of your turns, this maneuver does its damage, even if played as a reversal, until it is reversed.

name: Let's Wrestle Already!
effect:
As an action, shuffle this card into your Arsenal and draw 1 card.
As a reversal, when overturned by a non-damage card effect, even during the Pre-match phase, reverse the effect, shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, and end your opponent's turn.

name: Lousy Foot Work
effect:
Your opponent may discard the card titled Escape Move or Step Aside. If he does not, during his next turn, he cannot play Maneuver cards.
"Folks, she's about as graceful as a cow on ice." - Jim Ross

name: Managed by Jamie Noble
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then put up to 2 cards from your Ringside pile into your hand.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: Managed by Miss Jackie
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, you may shuffle up to 10 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.
When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile, put 1 non-unique non-Superstar-specific Pre-match card from your Ringside pile into your Ring area, and then end your turn.
Raw logo
Universally Unique

name: Managed by Stevie Richards
effect:
The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is reduced by 1.
When this card is in your Ring area, you may put this card into your Ringside pile to reverse any non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
When this card is in your Ringside pile, during your turn you may discard 4 cards and then put this card into your Ring area. When the card titled Stevie Interferes is in your Ring area, discard 1 card instead.
Raw logo
Unique

name: Managed by Theodore Long
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, your cards titled Don't Hate da Playa, Hate da Game cannot be reversed.
When this card is in your Ring area, if you have fewer cards in your hand than your opponent, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile, draw 5 cards, and discard 2 cards.
Raw logo
Universally Unique

name: Modified Bow & Arrow
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played Submission maneuver or if your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating.
Cannot be reversed by the card titled Backlash! or Strangle Hold.
When successfully played, search your Arsenal for the card titled Maintain Hold, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

name: Modified Clutch Onto Opponent
effect:
Can only be packed by a Diva Superstar.
Can only be reversed by cards that specifically reverse the card titled Clutch onto Opponent.
When successfully played, draw 1 card or look at your opponent's hand.
You cannot play the card titled Maintain Hold or Apply Illegal Leverage immediately after this card.

name: Molly-Go-Round
effect:
You may search for and play this card as if it were a High Risk maneuver.
As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. When successfully played, if you have 5 or more cards in your hand than your opponent, you win the game via Pinfall victory.
As an action, this card is -25F, shuffle this card into your Arsenal and draw up to 2 cards. Doing this will cause no damage to your opponent.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 3

name: Mr. Monday Night
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver or if this is the first card played of your turn and you reversed a card from your hand or Backlash deck to end your opponent's last turn.
Can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal.
Raw logo
Permanent
Unique

name: My New Gimmick
effect:
Draw 1 card.
Name 1 non-unique non-Superstar-specific Maneuver card. All cards with that title are Permanent.
Permanent
"Goodness gracious, with this gimmick you'd have to think he'll be a Champion someday, folks." - Jim Ross

name: Nidia
effect:
Diva Superstar Ability:
You cannot pack maneuvers of 4D or greater. You can pack the card titled Tough Enough! Your cards titled Trailer Park Trash and Kissing Up to the Stinkin' Fans are not Heel cards. Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 Action card and then shuffle up to 2 non-hybrid cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

name: Nidia, Hook Up the Double Wide
effect:
Shuffle up to # cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, where # is equal to double the cards you have in your hand. # cannot be greater than 10.
Smackdown logo
Unique
"C'mon, Nidia, we gotta git!" - Jamie Noble

name: No Matching Tights
effect:
As an action, reveal 1 card in your hand with the same title as a card in your Ring area. Discard it and draw up to 2 cards.
As a reversal, when played from your hand, reverse any card and end your opponent's turn. If your opponent does not have 1 card in his Ring area with the same title as the reversed card, you must reveal 1 card in your hand with the same title as the reversed card.

name: Not Today, Cupcake!
effect:
Can only be played when your opponent has the card titled Bra & Panties Match or a Female Manager card in his Ring area.
Choose 1 Event card in your opponent's Ring area. When this card is in your Ring area, that card is blanked.

name: Old School Psychology
effect: When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent cannot play the card titled Old School Wrestling Match and when he plays a Backlash deck card, he discards 1 card.

name: Once You Go Test, You Forget the Rest
effect:
You may put this card into your Ring area before the Pre-match.
When this card is in your Ring area, the maximum number of Pre-match and Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1, and if your opponent is a Female Superstar, you may put this card into your Ringside pile to reverse any card and end your opponent's turn.
Raw logo
Unique

name: Overshot Your Mark
effect:
Reverse any Strike maneuver of 5D or greater, any High Risk maneuver, or any maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip, and end your opponent's turn. # is equal to the reversed maneuver's Damage, read as 0 in your Ring area.
"Some fools never learn, no matter what you try and teach them." - Al Snow

name: Panic Assault
effect:
Can only be played when your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Can only be played with a printed F:0 Grapple maneuver of printed 3D or less from your hand. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Over Sell Maneuver immediately after you play these cards.
Unless your opponent reverses both maneuvers, both are considered successfully played and both go into your Ring area. Unless both cards are reversed, your turn continues.

name: Panic Grab
effect:
Can only be played when your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Can only be played with a printed F:0 Submission maneuver of printed 4D or less from your hand. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Over Sell Maneuver immediately after you play these cards.
Unless your opponent reverses both maneuvers, both are considered successfully played and both go into your Ring area. Unless both cards are reversed, your turn continues.

name: Panic Throw
effect:
Can only be played when your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Can only be played with a printed F:0 Strike maneuver of printed 3D or less from your hand. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Over Sell Maneuver immediately after you play these cards.
Unless your opponent reverses both maneuvers, both are considered successfully played and both go into your Ring area. Unless both cards are reversed, your turn continues.

name: Perennial Fan Favorites
effect:
Can only be packed if your Superstar card says you cannot play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts or if this is a Tag Team format match.
When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and shuffle up to 6 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and put 1 Face card from your Ringside pile into your hand.
(Tag Team Only Symbol)

name: Pump Me Up
effect:
Reverse any non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Draw up to 2 cards.

Unique

effect:
Can only be packed by a Female Superstar.
Put any number of cards titled Puppies! Puppies! from your hand under this card, and then search your Arsenal for any number of those cards, reveal them to your opponent, put them under this card, and shuffle your Arsenal.
When this card is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns you may remove this card from the game or put 1 card from under this card into your Ringside pile and your next card played this turn is -10F.
If this card is removed from your Ring area, put all cards under it into your Ringside pile.
Active

name: Puppy Power!
effect:
Shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and then draw 1 card, or discard 1 card and then your opponent overturns 2 cards. End your turn.
When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may discard 2 cards and then put this card into your hand.

Unique

This card is -2F when the card titled Recovery is in your Ring area.
